name: Late Night Shift
storyline: You play as Tony, a worker covering the late shift at a remote gas station. Arriving late, you take over from your coworker, Mike, and begin your routine tasks. Everything seems normal—until it isn't. As the night unfolds, strange encounters, eerie customers, and an unknown presence lurking in the darkness turn your shift into a fight for survival.
summary: Late Night Shift is a first-person horror game where you step into the shoes of a gas station employee working an overnight shift deep in the woods. What starts as another dull night quickly turns into something far more sinister.
